thread.title: A pleasant surprise .... perfect for the family
thread.title_full: A pleasant surprise .... perfect for the family - Review of Citadines South Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: albertogas66
title: A pleasant surprise .... perfect for the family
text:
Me and my family have had the pleasure of staying there for a few days during our holiday in London. A quiet place, located in a safe neighborhood, convenient to velecemente all major attractions the city. Perfect for those who do not feel obligated to stay in a traditional hotel.
We will definitely be back during our next vacation.
Room Tip: Accessibility, quiet rooms, safe neighborhood See more room tips
